    • genericComparisonOpcode

      public static int genericComparisonOpcode(int intCompareOp)
      For a given integer comparison opcode, returns its generic comparison opcode.
      Parameters:
      intCompareOp - the integer opcode (e.g. IF_ICMPGT)
      Returns:
      its equivalent generic form (e.g. IFGT)

    • mathOpcodeForType

      public static int mathOpcodeForType(int intOp, Class<?> type)
      For a given integer arithmetic opcode, returns the type-specific opcode.
      Parameters:
      intOp - the arithmetic opcode for int (IADD, ISUB, IMUL, IDIV, IREM, INEG)
      type - the primitive type for which to obtain the opcode
      Returns:
      the type-specific opcode (e.g. DADD, DSUB, etc.)
